description: This file defines a payment processing service with a single publicly exported function 'processPayment' that mocks payment processing. It generates a unique payment reference and handles only a 'mock' payment method.

methods.name: processPayment({ amount, currency, method, metadata })
methods.description: Mocks payment processing, accepts payment details, and returns a success response with a generated reference.

ctags.name: processPayment
ctags.pattern: /^export function processPayment({ amount, currency, method, metadata }) {$/
